name: Friend
description: We'll give you an invite to the private beta!

name: Supporter
description: Get an FCM Transparency Warrior mug, and an invite to the private beta!

name: Backer
description: Get an FCM Transparency Warrior tote bag, and an invite to the private beta!

name: Sponsor
description: Get both the Transparency Warrior mug and tote bag, and an invite to the private alpha, a full month before our beta release! We'll also list you publicly on our supporters page!

name: Investor
description: Get the mug, tote bag, 5 early alpha invites, and a public listing on our supporters page!

name: Inner Circle
description: Wow, you're passionate about transparency! Get all the swag, 10 early alpha invites, public listing on our supporters page, and the ability to give direct feedback that helps shape fatcatmap!

name: Transparency Warrior
description: As a critical supporter of the movement, you want to be involved as early and often as possible. Get 50 early alpha invites, public listing, 2x all the swag, and the ability to give direct feedbat that helps shape fatcatmap!

name: Fat Cat
description: Get any bill you want passed in Congress. Ha ha, just kidding! You're the kind of supporter that makes transparency possible. Because of supporters like you, the fight for sunlight in Washington has hope. You'll get a free lunch with the development team, all of the above, and as many early alpha/beta invites as you can eat!

name: Mate
description: We'll have you on board!

name: Green Thumb
description: You get a thumbs up!

name: Lookout
description: You get a picture of us on the sunfish.

name: Deck Hand
description: You get a picture of us on the Tayana.

name: First Mate
description: You get a ride on the Tayana.

name: Captain
description: One week of cube space rental on the real boat.

name: Carrot
description: One free item at the next carrot mob.

name: User
description: Early access to our online database.

name: Nice Person
description: Early access to the website.

name: Nicer Person
description: Your name on the front page of the website for the first month (small text).

name: Really a Very Nice Person
description: A hat.

name: Wow, Such a Nice Person, and Good Looking as Well!
description: You can pet on animal of your choosing.

name: Script Kiddie
description: You're an interested or aspiring developer, who is inspired by our work. Get a vote and have your say about AppTools!

name: Aspiring Developer
description: Programming is AWESOME, RIGHT?? And you know this, and that's why you want to be a part of the AppTools effort.

name: Senior Engineer
description: You've seen it all. Except AppTools of course! You are a true follower of the Tao of Programming. You have risen above the code. You have already resolved that jQuery must be killed for perfect harmony in the universe.

name: Sensei
description: You have risen above the Tao, for you understand the true nature of the universe, and the evils of jQuery. You see plugins as the worst thing to happen to the human race, since Karate Kid.
